turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what type of coffee would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, where do you want to pickup your drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks by the Target in Cerritos, California.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your grande americano will be ready for pickup soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, cool. That's all I needed.
